articles.content: Story HighlightsSoFi shares slipped after earnings, but Mizuho analyst Dan Dolev calls the pullback a buying opportunity. Let’s understand why.

articles.title: Why are Amazon, Oracle and others laying off thousands? AI not sole reason: What staff, insiders, economists say | World News - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Many assumed Amazon's 16,000 corporate layoffs reflected push to reduce total corporate workforce for "efficiency gains from using AI extensively” | World News
articles.content: Layoffs in the thousands by Amazon, Oracle and other tech-focused companies are routinely being blamed on Artificial Intelligence (AI), but affected workers and analysts see reasons beyond and behind… [+6037 chars]
